name: BCDE
description: A novel metaheuristic algorithm named Boundary-Constrained Differential Evolution (BCDE) that leverages boundary handling strategies to improve convergence on the BBOB test suite.
feedback: The algorithm BCDE got an average Area over the convergence curve (AOCC, 1.0 is the best) score of 0.09 with standard deviation 0.07.

name: EnhancedBCDE
description: Enhancing Boundary-Constrained Differential Evolution (BCDE) by incorporating a dynamic mutation strategy for improved exploration-exploitation balance.
feedback: The algorithm EnhancedBCDE got an average Area over the convergence curve (AOCC, 1.0 is the best) score of 0.09 with standard deviation 0.07.
